city_assets_fact_sheet.description: A detailed valuation of key transit stations and their surrounding assets within the fictional Summit City, providing insights into infrastructure, economic impact, and urban planning.
valuation_assumptions: High-value, developed economy comparable to a major global city.
Valuations reflect present and future economic, social, and functional value, not just construction cost.
